about_the_game:
Super Drift Blade is a thrilling roguelite game packed with a large amount of puzzle elements. The combat system is designed to be unique, allowing you to control everything with simple mouse movements—easy to pick up but still engaging. The game's design draws inspiration from well-known titles like The Legend of Zelda, Outer Wilds and Dark Souls.

Your journey begins with your friends mysteriously disappearing. Armed with only their clues, you set out to track them down and save them. Along the way, you will battle fierce enemies, solve challenging puzzles, and uncover the hidden secrets of this world. Get ready to team up with your friends and discover the truth together!

You only need to move your mouse, no need to press any buttons. During combat, just slide the mouse in the direction of your enemies, and your character will automatically attack. The controls are simple, but the thrill of battle remains. Of course, if you're feeling adventurous, try clicking the left mouse button for a surprise!

The game features a huge map, with plenty of side areas to explore in addition to the main storyline. Beyond the vast landscapes, you will encounter a wide range of enemies—from basic melee monsters to ranged foes that launch barrages of attacks. And yes, you will also face powerful bosses! There are many different combinations of enemies for you to challenge and keep things fresh every run.

The devloper Liujiajun continues the creative spirit from his previous game Bubble People and other works, bringing fresh and innovative puzzle designs to Super Drift Blade. Drawing inspiration from iconic games like The Legend of Zelda and Outer Wilds, the game features a vast array of fun and engaging puzzles waiting for you to solve. As you dive deeper into the game, each puzzle brings you closer to uncovering the truth of this world, while also making your character stronger with each discovery. If you're a fan of puzzle games, you will likely enjoy this one.

In each map, you will find treasure chests filled with rich rewards, and after every battle, you will be given a choice of various attribute growth options. However, these upgrades only apply to that specific run and won’t carry over to your next run. To truly strengthen your character’s permanent stats, solving puzzles is the key.

While the game does not focus heavily on its storyline, there is a main plot woven throughout. As you battle and solve puzzles, you will gradually piece together the mysteries of this world, uncovering more of its story along the way.

About the Developer

From the developer of Bubble People, using the same jittery hand-drawn style and adding more color! This is my 8th game on Steam.
